StWork.preProcess: PcTargetByDirection(1, 360, 370, 800, 1) AND GetCombatTime() > 25000 AND IsPrevAttack(1, 19) == 0 AND IsPrevAttack(1, 20) == 0 AND IsPrevAttack(1, 34) == 0
PcTargetByDirection(180, 80, 0, 350, 0) AND IsPrevAttack(1, 17) == 0 AND IsPrevAttack(1, 18) == 0 AND IsInAbnormality(48239) == 0 AND GetCombatTime() > 35000

Work.preProcess: PcTargetByAggro() AND GetTargetDistance() < 150 AND GetTargetDir() > 210 AND GetTargetDir() < 330
PcTargetByAggro() AND GetTargetDistance() < 150 AND GetTargetDir() > 30 AND GetTargetDir() < 150
